website_summaries.verdict: The HP Deskjet 3050A All-in-One printer marries an attractive design with the latest cloud printing technology in a multifunction device that works for small offices that don't need to print a lot of full-color photos.
pros: The HP Deskjet 3050A features a refreshing design and its wireless Web connectivity lets you print in the cloud with HP ePrint technology
cons: The printer lacks an Ethernet port for wired networking and its dual ink cartridge bay is a money sink if you print a high volume of photos and color documents

customer_reviews.title: Worst printer ever. Go with Cannon.
customer_reviews.text: First of all, most printers are not easy to deal with and can be frustrating. I had this printer for two years before I finally decided to go online and find the instructions on how to setup WiFi. Extremely difficult process. I just got a new WiFi and I cannot set it up on the new network, nor will it let me print with a cable. This printer is the biggest piece of crap. I’m 8 years in to it. Go with Cannon.
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect basic printer
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something basic. I mainly print in black ink (notes for class). I needed a printer without alot of bells and whistles. I do like the copier function. Overall, if you're looking for a basic printer for school, this is a good one at a good price. I've had it since October 2011 and haven't had any problems with it yet. If I do, I'll update. HP makes a good product. I would suggest this product to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: ShanaTX

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I occasionally needed a printer for short, quick jobs. I'm happy with the print quality and operating costs. And it's fairly quick too. But its paper handling is miserable. EVERY TIME I attempt to print something I get error messages that I am low on paper, even though the printer is full of paper. And note that I said messages not a message. I must remove and then replace the paper a number of times before I can print. I spend more time trying to get the printer to print than it actually takes it to print. Spend more money and get a better printer. This one is a loser.
customer_reviews.author: tshylo

customer_reviews.title: Photo printer only
customer_reviews.text: If all you want to scan are photos this printer works great. When I purchased it, I didn't understand that the reason it's called a photo printer is that everything comes out looking like a picture. Since I needed it to scan documents, it just didn't work. They were pictures of documents. Of course Amazon allowed me to return it and find one that filled my needs. Bottom line I would have to say was my own fault. I didn't get the concept of a picture of a document. Other than that problem it was a very good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great wireless printer!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great choice if you are looking for a standard home wireless printer. Having a previous HP printer, I expected high quality, and this printer has definitely met my expectations. The wireless is easy to set up and even features eprint for printing from a tablet or smartphone. The setup took less than 5 minutes. I have been using this printer purely wirelessly. I have scanned, copied, and printed with no problems. I also have printed from one floor below where the printer is located with no problems. One note, it comes with a color and black ink cartridge. This is helpful in setting up the printer. Overall, great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: From a first time wireless printer user.
customer_reviews.text: I can't claim to have alot of experience with other printers but I can safely say if I can set this thing up anyone can. The CD that walks you through the setup was pretty simple to follow and everything worked like a charm. It does picture printing really good too when I was experimenting with my iPad and iPhone. It was zero set up to get Air Print to work. My devices just detected the printer. If you have an iPhone or iPad you have to get this and maybe some picture printing paper too. You know, finally print out one or two of those pictures you've been taking.
customer_reviews.author: Reknbal

customer_reviews.title: Not only is a great wifi printer for home, but now I can also print using my home wifi from my iPhone 6.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing better than a wireless printer, especially since I can also print to it from my iPhone 6. I used a printer at my brother's house and it was SO annoying to plug the USB cable in to my laptop to print something.. I guess you get use to this technology and wonder how you did without it... I love it.
customer_reviews.author: L. E. Hurst

customer_reviews.title: price and features was right
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit to go with my new desktop computer. It has a small footprint but does good job copying, printing and scanning. It installed very easily and worked from the beginning. Now i did actually have a problem when I first got it, that my windows 7 computer would shut down every time I printed a page. The HP site did have a solution, something in my registry had to be changed, but once fixed the problem went away.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen M. Betheil

customer_reviews.title: Ink Hog
customer_reviews.text: This printer works fine. My major complaint is that it uses ink faster than I can buy it. On top of that, the printer is finicky about exactly what kind of ink it will accept. If it is a refilled cartridge, the printer complains it is not genuine HP ink. I guess this is what you get for a cheap printer. I wish our last printer had lived longer...although it had a great long life. I'd not buy this printer again. And, I highly suggest you don't buy it either.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Great printer for light home use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this printer to use in my apartment. The main draw of this printer was how easy it was to set up and maintain, as well as the ability to print wirelessly. This printer is perfect for users who don't print a lot of pages and just need a printer/scanner around. I was impressed with how easy it was to actually set up on my home network, I just pressed a button on the printer and pressed a button on my wireless router and I was done! So simple! install on my computers was just as simple. I would definitely recommend this printer to anyone who needs a small printer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Product
customer_reviews.text: This product is a poorly made. From the cheap plastic case to the bug filled software. It lasted exactly one week in my home and poof, won't stop turning off and on in an endless cycle. I have never seen an HP this poorly made before and I have always bought HP printers that lasted forever. Never again!! What a waste of money. I have little hope for a refund as I threw away the box after a few days. Buyer Beware.
customer_reviews.author: Susa

customer_reviews.title: USELESS if using replacement cartridges.
customer_reviews.text: It has a very very clever system to lock you out of using reconditioned HP cartridges. I used Sophie's but the machine finds every which way to stop you printing with anything but HP cartridges. ONE it's a total lie by HP that says I can use replacements if I click the OK button, TWO I think that's illegal that they can say that. Anyone from HP like to challenge me on that?
customer_reviews.author: elektrapops

customer_reviews.title: A great little printer
customer_reviews.text: I have not had good luck with my printers for one reason or another. For the price, this appears as though it's going to be better than the rest. It was reasonable simple to set up, and although the instructions are less than clear as to how to operate it, I figured it out pretty quickly. (I'm a non-mechanical person) It prints wonderfully in clear black ink and color, and it's pretty easy to install the ink cartridges. I've only had this printer for a month, but if things continue on this way, I will bless HP forever.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth C. Dunbar

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be more pleased
customer_reviews.text: My hp 1200 series printer which I've loved for about ten years finally gave up the ghost and it became apparent that I needed to replace it. The 3050A is stylish, fairly quiet and makes great copies... oh boy oh boy! I have not printed any photos with it yet and can't comment on the photo quality. Documents look great and set-up was a breeze. A definite recommendation!
customer_reviews.author: saxpistols

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect. Nice airPrint solution.
customer_reviews.text: i use everything apple at home and my small business. Needed the ability to print over wi-fi. This printer did just that. Why 4 stars? I have Mountain Lion (OSX 10.8) on my mac and it was HELL to install this and leave it working. Bought the same printer for my sister who still uses Lion (OSX 10.7) and the installation CD made it work in seconds. Scans thru Preview in the MacOS and its awesome. Copy as well. For those with Mountain Lion just go find the printer drivers online and it will install smoothly. Not that fast printing but i'm never in that kind of hurry.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: horrible printer
customer_reviews.text: this printer only prints instead of being all in one printer. i have been having problem scanning documents with this printer and i have a macbook and i cannot use wireless, so if you cannot use wireless print with this printer and i tried so many times and it only scans half of the page and the rest of the half the scanner does not do full scan. So, be aware with this product. I would like to return this printer but just for the return it would cost me about $30 which is not reimbursed or refunded. So, i regret buying this printer.
customer_reviews.author: Temba Sherpa

customer_reviews.title: Printer fine. Would not initialize as was shipped with non ...
customer_reviews.text: Printer fine. Would not initialize as was shipped with non HP genuine print cartridge. Bought this to have for grandchildren as it was same as theirs at home. Did not attempt to even open or use for sometime. Cost me 50 dollars for genuine HP cartridge in emergent situation. Have owned 6 HP printers... still have fake cartridge if you care to do the right thing
customer_reviews.author: Nin

customer_reviews.title: HP 3050A Office Jet Printer
customer_reviews.text: I've been a loyal HP fan for a long time and the 3050A Office jet printer has been my printer of choice for several years. This company provided me with jus what I needed at very good price. Great company.
customer_reviews.author: James K.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY HP
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this printer because I have always had HP printers with very good results. I set this printer up and it was never able to align the ink cartridges correctly. I called HP and was on the phone for over an hour. The best they would do for me was to send me a refurbished printer. This printer was brand new and I was going to get a refurbished printer!!!! I don't think so. A 'case manager' called me the next day and he reaffirmed that all they could do was to send me a refurbished product! I will never purchase an HP product again. Very disappointed in HP.
customer_reviews.author: Boscoe

customer_reviews.title: this product as stated comes with nothing
customer_reviews.text: It states that you can go online to get the program. But most websites want to download some things on my computer. I found one that I can buy it from. So I order it from them. I should have bought a new one in the first place that includes everything.
customer_reviews.author: kngpn1

customer_reviews.title: HP 3050A Wireless Printer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this printer for use with my daughter's macbook pro that she was taking to college with her. The printer was easy to set up for the mac, which I had concerns about. I love HP printers... I've had one for years. This all in one is everything she will need while away at college. I'm very happy with our purchase. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Velby

customer_reviews.title: Happy with HP
customer_reviews.text: I love HP and I love this printer. I scan everything. I didn't think I'd use the wireless function, but now that I have the thing sitting across the house out of my office, I like that it opened up my office space. My family likes that everyone can use the same printer. Buy this...it's worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Was good until it broke
customer_reviews.text: This was a great printer/fax/copier and I loved the wireless feature but I had only had it a few months when something in the paper feed broke and now it won't pull the paper in any more. To print I have to stand there and shove the paper down until the print head catches it.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Moore

customer_reviews.title: Beware of Ink Costs and Ineffective Printing!
customer_reviews.text: This printer works like a charm, but ink costs a fortune. The black ink cartridge is miniscule and not cheap, usually being sold for around $18. I use this printer very rarely and the ink is always used up almost instantaneously. The cartridge says its supposed to get 190 pages, but after about 50 print the printer shouts "low ink" and prints another 10 pages in faint ink before totally petering out. I have had this printer for less than a year and am already considering getting rid of it.
customer_reviews.author: E. G. Mercer

customer_reviews.title: High quality product and eay to configure
customer_reviews.text: Had this printer deliver to my son and daughter at university. My daughter was very pleased with the quality of the print capability, including the digital photos she prints for friends. My son was very pleased with the quick no hassle set-up and how easy it was to connect to their wireless router.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Ray Betz

customer_reviews.title: HP Printers are not created equal
customer_reviews.text: This printer has far exceeded my expectations. I love it! It was so neat the other morning I had to write a letter and the laptop was in another room, but as soon as I hit the print button, the printer started churning out my letter!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Gillispie

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy one!
customer_reviews.text: First time I did not love an HP printer ... now have another coming, but this one just did not make it here at our home office. Hate to say it because all other HP printers have been fabulous ... this one had to be dropped on it's head at birth.
customer_reviews.author: dbcopper

customer_reviews.title: Easy wireless install
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. My last printer was constantly dropping it's wireless connection, forcing me to uninstall and reinstall the software. What a hassle! This new HP was so easy to install, it took only seconds, and it has never dropped the signal. It's performance has been great, although I cannot commit on photo quality as I have not yet used this feature.
customer_reviews.author: Cindyahgogo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Easiest printer we have every owned. Its compact, Lightweight, User friendly. We travel a lot and this printer travels with us. We are seniors and don't have trouble using it. thats the best part
customer_reviews.author: P. Mulligan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Printer on a Budget
customer_reviews.text: As a college student I need something convenient and cheap to use for a printer and this does it. The product is lightweight and doesn't take up too much space. If you want fun activities there is a selection of quick forms that include games such as sudoku and a maze. The wireless works great and it was really easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Brophy

customer_reviews.title: printer great for the price
customer_reviews.text: printer great for the price. HP still fails to have a simple way to recognize if the printer is off line and how to easily put it back on line. A real pain.
customer_reviews.author: yiming

customer_reviews.title: Great product, Great Price,
customer_reviews.text: I chose 5 stars, because everything about this product was great. From the way it was carefully packaged to ensure safe delivery to the step by step directions on how to set everything set up including the wireless activity involved. The price is even better. Especially when I went to a store yesterday and saw the same one going for $15.00 more before tax and my price included shipping. All in all Im pretty happy with my purchase and would reccomend it to anyone looking for a good quality resonaby priced all-in-one printer.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron  A. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Good printer & scanner
customer_reviews.text: This printer suits my needs perfectly: it has a good scanner and a good printer. The printer can be set to black & white to save colour ink. The set up directions are easy to follow, so setting it up for wireless use was quite easy.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Nice little printer
customer_reviews.text: I chose this printer based on its small size, the (relatively) low cost of its toner cartridges, its good reviews, and its cost. It was very easy to set up and has worked like a charm since I plugged it in.
customer_reviews.author: C. J. Schubert

customer_reviews.title: So easy!
customer_reviews.text: It took longer to unwrap this than to get it up and running. It arrived on time, well packaged and was real easy to hook up. I recommend one of these to anyone who's tired of 60 page instruction manuals.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Harry

customer_reviews.title: Works Like a Charm
customer_reviews.text: SO LIGHT! I love it cause I can easily fold everything up and bring it with when I move out, prints like a gem you just have to configure everything which can be a headache at times, but overall a great printer!
customer_reviews.author: Ren Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Good product and even better service.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter. When the printer arrived the paper handler was broken. We contacted the seller and they said they would reimburse the cost. My daughter lives in an apartment which is a considerable distance from the post office. She is small and the box was quite large. She could not carry it to the post office so the seller sent info to make arrangements to have it picked up at her apartment ( by UPS). I was quite pleased with their response. The printer was returned and we purchased another on from them. I appreciate excellent service and this is exactly what we received.
customer_reviews.author: Careful Shopper

customer_reviews.title: No booklet enclosed
customer_reviews.text: Sttated in the contents with words and pictures that not only the CD was enclosed but a written booklet to go with it. It did not have it and thus still not sure how to properly use it
customer_reviews.author: Diane B

customer_reviews.title: really like this printer easy to use
customer_reviews.text: really like this printer easy to use, very easy to add to your wireless network and print form any where. ink cartridges are very in expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Ronin

customer_reviews.title: A good printer
customer_reviews.text: i like this one better than the Epson I had before. The cartridges seem to last longer on the HP. Be sure to use the XL cartridges that last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Bob B

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I had to purchase this due to the fact that mine is acting up. I really like the wireless connection. Makes using laptops much easier. Prints pretty fast. The only thing I'm not sure about is that it takes two cartridges, black and color. Only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Sandee

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little printer for the home. Print quality is excellent, and printing speed is very good. Haven't used the wireless features so unable to comment on that.
customer_reviews.author: Mark G

customer_reviews.title: Great printer for a great price
customer_reviews.text: This may not be the most sophisticated printer in the world, but if for the price i got it for i mean i couldn't ask for anything better. It scans, copies and prints. It isn't super loud and i jsut think it's a great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Never again.
customer_reviews.text: Never again. This printer is way cheap. It now just sits in the corner not used. Unit is noisy when printing, have time it does not take paper and you have to hand feed it.
customer_reviews.author: M. F. Van Order

customer_reviews.title: Printer
customer_reviews.text: I have not had it all that long but what I have done with it I am satisfied. I like the feature of scanning and printing right from the printer and not having to send to computer then print. Also I like the feature now that the paper does not have to bend and turn over to print.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Mccutcheon

customer_reviews.title: It is not reliable..better make a sacrifice,and buy something better....
customer_reviews.text: It is not reliable...do not use that much, already givin me head aches... The worst is, that i can not return this thing...have for 2 years, maybe i used 10 times,,,
customer_reviews.author: edrocky

customer_reviews.title: Awful!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This came in very promptly but paper holder was broke and it stopped working the first day!!!! I can deal with the paper holder not working but to not work at all is ridiculous!!
customer_reviews.author: Nurse

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding machine. Comes with ink and all. The only necessary thing to do is download a driver from windows (if you have Win 8) easy process. Love the e-print feature.
customer_reviews.author: J Michael

customer_reviews.title: good copier
customer_reviews.text: This copier works fine and produces very good color copies. It is small and doesn't take up much space. The price was not very expensive.
customer_reviews.author: BRODY

customer_reviews.title: ... this printer for almost a year and it works like a brought yesterday will buy it
customer_reviews.text: I have this printer for almost a year and it works like a brought yesterday will buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Francine Diaz

customer_reviews.title: printer
customer_reviews.text: I use it every day love it nice and easy to use liked the fast shipping and the good quality. Would look for this type of equipment from them again. Really like it
customer_reviews.author: stubby

customer_reviews.title: Retailer FRAUD
customer_reviews.text: FRAUD-I ordered a new machine. According to HP Support, based on the SN, this machine was manufactured in 2011 and is out of warranty. Further, it has been registered to another person; which means that it was used and sold as new. FRAUD-FRAUD.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Ross

customer_reviews.title: Great Printer and Expect No Less
customer_reviews.text: This printer is designed to do exactly what it states and for the price, you cannot beat it. Quality is great. Have yet to "air print" with mobile device, but so far all is good. This is my second HP. I am very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon362

customer_reviews.title: great fetures
customer_reviews.text: I have an IMAC, a laptop PC running windos 7 an an Ipad. I got home from work at 6:PM ate dinner and by 7:30PM I was printing on all three. I also sighned up for eprint that also was extremely easy. The print quality is good for an $80 printer. I replaced a wireless epson that died after 18 months, of course it is too early to comment on the longjevity my new hp printer. I cannot say too much about the ease of setting up this printer, that alone made it worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Denny

customer_reviews.title: Love this printer
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely thrilled with this printer. I got a new laptop and needed a new scanner/copier and wanted it to be small and lightweight. I am a woman of a certain age and am not the most computer savvy person. Once I unpacked the printer and plugged it in, it immediately located my router. I popped in the CD and was printing and copying within minutes. Thank you Amazon and HP. Indysue
customer_reviews.author: Sue Welcher

customer_reviews.title: Great printer!
customer_reviews.text: Our Dell printer wasn't feeding paper correctly, so we bought this HP to replace it. Very good printer! We run Windows 7, and this printer has been completely compatible. Wouldn't hesitate to buy from HP again.
customer_reviews.author: emilyfromiowa

customer_reviews.title: Light Weight
customer_reviews.text: Printing quality is not excellent and price is not very competitive though sufficient for personal use. I would only rate 3 stars as it is all in one product which meets personal requirements of any family or small businesses. I would not recommend but leave it to individuals to choose it based on its product features it can deliver.
customer_reviews.author: sree

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product and I received it with in 2 business days. It has the features I was looking for at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Great Wireless Printer
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my printer. It is great for people that don't sit at a desk and do their computer work. I love printing from my Ipad or Iphone. It is so easy to use and the print quality is great. I don't know why I didn't get one sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Amy B

customer_reviews.title: great printer
customer_reviews.text: I was a little apprehensive bc the price is so cheap but this is a great printer!! Great scanner as well. High quality!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Was very satisfied with this purchase. Came intact and worked. Now I can copy important papers at home and scan them too without a special trip up to Staples or other store to accomplish my tasks!
customer_reviews.author: Alice Ryczek

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup and great printing!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy setup and the quality is great. Quick printing on basic documents as well. Haven't set up the wireless yet though. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda C. DePriest

customer_reviews.title: Great when you get it setup
customer_reviews.text: Took awhile for me to get this thing synced with my iPad, but now works perfectly. Wish the instructions were a little more helpful considering the amount of trial and error that took place. For the money and everything, it's totally worth it. No jams or connection errors.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Mine
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my lap top,,,,,It works so good and the inks are not that bad to replace as far as cost goes
customer_reviews.author: Jamie R Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Love the printer!
customer_reviews.text: It' great to not have to pay outragiously for copies anymore!!!!!!!! I do volunteer clowning and have my own coloring book to give the kids. This saves me a heap of money! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Ann Creed

customer_reviews.title: wireless printer
customer_reviews.text: i found this printer to be very reliable and easy to use.the ink lasts a long time but dont get caught when its getting low,overall i like it.
customer_reviews.author: Rudolf J. Weikl

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product works as advertised and more. It prints as it is supposed to in no time. I would buy it again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: axel09

customer_reviews.title: Awsome!
customer_reviews.text: great for home use, has the scan that will work on my iTouch scan direct to my iTouch no need for a computer and can print from anywhere in the house!
customer_reviews.author: Val B. Sigler

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: Printer meets my expectations for a reasonable priced printer. I really appreciate the HP Eprint feature. I can print from my phone or while on the road. Gives me a chance to instantly print pictures on the go while my family members look on at home. I never was able to get Scanner to work.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: just love my printer....
customer_reviews.text: i just love it!!!! i would highly recommend this printer to anyone. if any one is in the market fr a printer this is the one too buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: J. P. Miller

customer_reviews.title: HP PRINTER CUSTOMER SERVICE IS GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I received this HP printer on time, as promised, from COMPUBIZUSA.COM. I love this printer. We have a number of devices in our household - 3 cell phones, iPad, 2 laptops, and iMac computer. Now we can print wirelessly from each one. Customer Service is excellent - easy to reach by phone and rapid turn around time.
customer_reviews.author: Clare Gnecco

customer_reviews.title: Printer
customer_reviews.text: Love this printer and scanner, pictures come out great and the printer is fast and the scanner also would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: evilsin66

customer_reviews.title: easy works
customer_reviews.text: Like I said on other electric products I usually ask for help not with this very easy to set up and works great for home use
customer_reviews.author: spud

customer_reviews.title: HP Printer
customer_reviews.text: I love my new printer and the fact that I can scan and send. However, the fact that I need to open and close the ink drawer before it will print when first started up is definitely not something that should be necessary. My computer guru is going to have a look at it when next he returns to see if he can find out what the problem is. Weird!!
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: It works well with the Ipad but prints to small. It is not possible to set margins on it, making some printing impossible
customer_reviews.author: John N Pierre

customer_reviews.title: Love the printer
customer_reviews.text: Love the printer. it works great. Never had an issue pairing it with my devices
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Monge

customer_reviews.title: HP 3050 Printer failed to print when I first set it up.  Works good now.
customer_reviews.text: This printer was very hard to set up. At first it wouldn't print. I had to have a friend check it out. It is functionin g well now. The seller gave me a hard time when I told him about the printer's failure to print.
customer_reviews.author: Louise A Volkstorf

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price you can't beat the printer, just know they will get you on the ink. I found the wireless set up to be a little finicky, got it all set up and then unplugged it to move and had to go through the whole process again, be prepared to connect it via usb and then set up wireless, it won't just find the network and connect as it ideally would.
customer_reviews.author: Neal Stoeckel

customer_reviews.title: HP Printer
customer_reviews.text: I have had several printers and in my opinion you can't beat HP. You can't tell an original photo from a copy on it, great job HP!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Barbour

customer_reviews.title: HP 3050A Printer
customer_reviews.text: I find that this is a good product at a very reasonable price. It worked good right out of the box. I would recommend it to anyone who needs inexpensive printing.
customer_reviews.author: D. Rifenburgh

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: I just got this, and I am not a big fan of inkjet printers. However, I must say it is great thus far. I love the fact that it is wireless, and the price is great (under $100) for an HP product.
customer_reviews.author: Warren

customer_reviews.title: Good printer, but tough to get it to load paper
customer_reviews.text: Overall the printer works well. The only issue I've had with it that is particularly annoying is that it keeps saying its out of paper when in fact its not. Seems to have trouble with feeding paper into itself without manual intervention.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: You get lots of maching for your money. I like being able to print from my iPad and it is wireless to boot -- a great purchase. I have already given several as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Gresh

customer_reviews.title: my personal printer
customer_reviews.text: what can I say great great awesome I would recommend it I could print from anywhere in my house because this product is wireless. thank you so much
customer_reviews.author: SHIRLEY M TUCKER

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use! Connected to computers and to wifi hotspot with no problems. Working superbly. Directions are clear and concise.
customer_reviews.author: Wholesome Living

customer_reviews.title: HP Printer
customer_reviews.text: Very good 3 in one printer for home use. I also have a slightly older version of this machine and it has been great. However, it took forever to get the software completey loaded on my wife's HP laptop. Must have been on the phone with India for 90 min.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: this model was not hp best product and just buy another model. the user interface was poorly design and return the model for my money
customer_reviews.author: S. Schlee

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy it, it's a piece of garbage!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for about a year and it's never worked right from the beginning. Chronic problems with the wireless. It goes through ink like CRAZY and every time you load a new ink cartridge it forces you to print a test/alignment page forcing you to use even more ink that you never have enough of. Now, it has just stopped working all together and won't power up. I was a loyal HP customer but my next printer is going to be anything but HP!
customer_reviews.author: Janet O'Lare

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy Printer !!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best printer I have ever owed, and being wireless makes my print jobs even quicker. I really love this printer!!!
customer_reviews.author: Helen Shone

customer_reviews.title: HP 3050A Wireless Printer
customer_reviews.text: I love this printer with its ability to print from any room I may be in. Haven't had any issues with paper jamming.
customer_reviews.author: J. Grace

customer_reviews.title: HP 3050A printer
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my new printer, it is doing exactly what I needed to do. Simple to use too. I have had it just a little over a month. It was shipped in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: L. Lance

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this printer, connected it easily, but never got it to print. The rollers that feed the paper were off line and the paper jammed with every try. I have bought several HP printers, in the past, and was not happy with the quality of the plastic use in the manufacture of this one. The mechanism's plastic was very thin and could easily fail. I sent it back and will look at another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Printer Needy

customer_reviews.title: New HP 3050a Printer
customer_reviews.text: I like this printer very must. My old printer was a canon and just quit working. I like the lower cost print carts. and the great photos it can print out. The wireless feature is also very handy.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Longdon

customer_reviews.title: Totally disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because I read hp had drivers for Linux users. This was the crucial point to buy it. Since it is a new hp All-in-One model, I thought it would be a very good product. I didn't have problems with the installation but after my 4th time printing, the paper jammed. I took it out but after that I couldn't print anymore. Every time I tried to print, the paper jammed. So now I am returning the product as well as the 2 cartridges I bought with that.
customer_reviews.author: g.

customer_reviews.title: Hewlett Packard 3050A Wireless All-in-One Color Photo Printer
customer_reviews.text: This is a good all-in-one color printer for my small office. It is easy to use. The only negative issue is that the power saver kicks in sooner than I would prefer.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Goldman

customer_reviews.title: uses ALOT of ink
customer_reviews.text: I only printed about 30 pictures and ran out of colored ink. This is going be pricey even though the quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: judyboo

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This HP is budget friendly and has all the bells and whistles of machines costing far more. Out of the box and running in minutes!
customer_reviews.author: Goinghomegirl

customer_reviews.title: appears to look like a nice printer.
customer_reviews.text: i orderd this printer so it would work with my hp/touch pad. i do have internet service and a wirless router but no computer. i can not down load the disc, nor can i find the ip number. my son in-law tried to set it up but he couldn't find the ip number either. looks like i will have to call staples to come and see if they can set up the printer for me. i wish i had gone to staples first and bought my tablet and printer from them. it just would have been easier. wish me luck.
customer_reviews.author: ml

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: great product, especially the small bag that is included if you have to carry it around anywhere. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Price

customer_reviews.title: 2nd time is a charm
customer_reviews.text: We had to send this product back to owner because the printer did not work. They did provide a new printer that did work that was replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Baisch

product_meta.title: Hewlett Packard 3050A Wireless All-in-One Color Photo Printer
product_meta.description:
Print, copy, and scan with the compact, wireless HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One, featuring HP ePrint. Print photos and documents from any mobile device, from virtually anywhere with HP ePrint. Just send it from your mobile device to your Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One and it automatically prints. This all-in-one delivers laser-quality text and vivid color, and helps save money and resources with optional high-capacity ink cartridges and HP Auto-Off Technology, which turns the printer off when you don’t need it.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 

WHY BUY?
 * Quick and easy wireless printing and sharing—automatically connect to a network1
 * 
 * HP ePrint—print documents, photos and more instantly from any mobile device. Just send it to your printer and it prints!2
 * 
 *  Save energy with HP Auto-Off Technology—turns your printer off when you don’t need it3 

EnlargeFUNCTIONS 



HP ePRINT™
Simply print wirelessly from your iPad®, iPhone®, and iPod touch®.3



AIRPRINT™
Simply print wirelessly from your iPad®, iPhone®, and iPod touch®.3




FEATURES
Built-in Wireless Printing
Print from any room without using cables


Built-in Wired Networking
Share your printer with multiple people


Two-sided Printing
Save paper by printing on both sides automatically


Memory Card Slots
Print photos without using a PC


Color LCD Screen
Edit photos and/or manage your printer easily


4 x 6 Color Photo Printing
Print brilliant photos for albums or to enhance business documents


Auto Document Feeder
Fax, scan and copy multiple pages automatically


INCLUDED NOT INCLUDED 
SPECIFICATIONS
Print Speed ISO Speeds: Up to 5.5 ppm black, up to 4 ppm color4


Scan Resolution up to 1200-dpi optical; maximum scan size 8.5" x 11.7"


Copy Maximum number of copies, up to 50 


Paper Handling 4" x 6" to 8.5" x 14"; up to 1,000 pages per month 



REMEMBER ORIGINAL HP INK AND PAPER SAVE MONEY when you choose high-capacity cartridges over standard ones
RECOMMENDED HP INK5

61190 pages61XL480 pages


61165 pages61XL330 pagesRECOMMENDED HP PAPER

HP Premium Plus Photo Paper


HP Bright White Inkjet Paper 





MORE INFORMATION 

Datasheet (PDF) 

WHICH HP PRINTER IS RIGHT FOR YOU? 
Compare the good, better and best, side by side 

See Comparison Chart 



 1. HP Auto Wireless Connect may not be available for all system configurations. Wireless performance is dependent upon physical environment and distance from access point. For information on compatibility, visit http://www.hp.com/go/autowirelessconnect.
 2. Requires an Internet connection to the printer. Feature works with any connected Internet- and e-mail-capable device. Print times may vary. Some HP LaserJets may require a firmware upgrade. For a list of supported documents, and image types, see www.hp.com/go/eprintcenter. And for additional solutions, see www.hp.com/go/mobile-printing-solutions.
 3.  HP Auto-On and Auto-Off capabilities subject to printer and settings.
 4. Either after first page or after first set of ISO test pages. For details see: http://www.hp.com/go/printerclaims.
 5.  Average cartridge yield: Declared yield value in accordance with ISO/IEC 19752 and ISO/IEC 19798. Actual yields vary based on specific use including images printed, printer, print settings and other factors. See www.hp.com/learnaboutsupplies for more information.
feature_bullets: Reduce energy consumption and conserve resources
Get easy wireless printing - even print through e-mail
Count on dependable performance and convenience
